MAN.TITLE: while

DESCRIPTION.P: while clause. Must be terminated by "end"
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_ITEM: The only constraint is that each "then" or "do" keyword must be on the same line line as "while" keyword.
The "keyword "then" or "do" can be replaced by a carriage return or a comma.
The optional ,else instructions construction allows to gives instructions which are executed when expr expression becomes false.
DESCRIPTION.P: Warning: the number of characters used to define the body of any conditionnal instruction (if while for or select/case) must be limited to 16k.
